book.synopsis: Celebrating the mystery and beauty of birds and sea creatures in their natural habitat, Under the Sea-Windâ Rachel Carson’s first book and her personal favoriteâ is the early masterwork of one of America’s greatest nature writers. Evoking the special mystery and beauty of the shore and the open seaâ its limitless vistas and twilight depthsâ Carson’s astonishingly intimate, unforgettable portrait captures the delicate negotiations of an ingeniously calibrated ecology.
book.title_long: Under the Sea Wind (Penguin Nature Classics Series)
book.dimensions: Height: 8 Inches, Length: 5.25 Inches, Weight: 0.5 Pounds, Width: 0.5 Inches
